title: Oma's Toll House Cupcakes
markdown:
Nathan,

Oma Dianne has some of the best recipes! When she decided to move from her home into assisted living she allowed me to have her recipe cards. I have not made all of them but I can almost guarantee they are the best. Just like you and your soon to be little brother. I love you dearly.

Mom

* ½ cup soft butter
* 6 Tbs sugar
* 6 Tbs brown sugar
* ½ tsp Vanilla
* 1 egg
* 1 cup and 2 Tbs flour (sifted)
* ½ tsp baking soda
* ½ tsp salt
* ½ cup packed brown sugar
* 1 egg
* ⅛ tsp salt
* 1 cup chocolate chips
* ½ cup nuts
* ½ tsp vanilla
* Preheat oven to 375 degrees
* Batter:
* Combine and beat till creamy butter, sugar, brown sugar, vanilla, and egg 
* Sift together and and stir in remaining dry ingredients
* Spoon by rounded tablespoons into cupcake cups
* Bake at 375 for 10 - 12 min remove from oven
* Topping: 
* Combine all ingredients
* Spoon 1 tablespoon over each cupcake
* Return to oven for 15 min
